Notes.Text:
This update for GraphicsMagick fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-16644: Added missing check for length in the functions ReadDCMImage
  and ReadPICTImage, which allowed remote attackers to cause a denial of service
  via a crafted image (bsc#1107609)
- CVE-2018-16645: Prevent excessive memory allocation issue in the functions
  ReadBMPImage and ReadDIBImage, which allowed remote attackers to cause a denial
  of service via a crafted image file (bsc#1107604)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: There is a missing check for length in the functions ReadDCMImage of coders/dcm.c and ReadPICTImage of coders/pict.c in ImageMagick 7.0.8-11, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted image.

Vulnerabilities.Description: There is an excessive memory allocation issue in the functions ReadBMPImage of coders/bmp.c and ReadDIBImage of coders/dib.c in ImageMagick 7.0.8-11, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted image file.
